Everything starts with clearly defined g: Everything starts with clearly defined goals—both yours and those of your potential customers. We can translate those goals into a digital strategy that defines the scope of what needs to be designed and built.
With the strategy in hand, I can draft a: With that blueprint in hand, I can draft a quote with a target date on which the realisation will start, and when the delivery of the end result could be. All I need now, is your agreement.
Once the production kicks off, an initia: Seeing is believing—the initial design phase will provide you with a first look the the result. The development phase will then make the design tangible. After proper testing and validation, we finally get the delivery!
Automated data consolidation for the new: Automated data consolidation for the new Vlaanderen.be website
Meaningful web products that are convers: Meaningful web products that are conversion-focused, brand-accurate and people-friendly.
Here’s what you can expect after you’ve: Here’s what you can expect after you’ve <2>contacted</2> me for your project:
It might appear simple on the surface, b: It might appear simple on the surface, but there are actually a number of <1>moving parts</1> to consider when creating products for the web.
design-service-content: <0>I create <1>timeless designs</1> for your website, and easy to understand <3>user interfaces</3> for your web applications.</0><1>User experience and accessibility are highly ranked on my checklist, so I  will always take them into consideration.</1><2>I can also help out with <1>branding</1> needs—a logo, a new font, or some fresh and dazzling colors. I’ll keep in mind that you might need some print work done in the future,by ensuring that your brand colors don’t look like mud on paper.</2><3>Need <1>actual</1> print work? let me know!</3><4></4>
development-service-content: <0>I build both simple static <1>websites</1>, as well as larger ones with a content management system. Translations? Check! Selling your products online? No problem.</0><1>You might need some custom built software for your company, or perhaps you are selling a digital product? I am no stranger to working on larger <2>web applications</2>, and also offer full-stack development. I work with modern and battle-tested technologies, deployed on a resilient cloud infrastructure.</1>
content-service-content: <0>Having a functional and good looking product only gets you so far. Your potential customers or users also need something to read and look at, something that inspires or informs them, but above all: convinces them to get in touch with you.</0><1>I work together closely with several talented freelancers that deliver top-notch <2>photography, videography and copywriting</2>.</1>
Don’t worry about having to speak to dif: Don’t worry about having to speak to different members of a team—any communication and decision making will be between you and me. A single contact for all your needs.
No endless waiting on a planning schedul: No endless waiting on a planning schedule.
Unexpected changes or requests can take: Unexpected changes or requests can take a while to make it into the planning of larger agencies. Having only my own schedule to manage, I can be quite flexible to accommodate your wishes.
Great value at a competitive price.
Taking the previous items in considerati: Being a one-man operation, I can offer my services at <1>a more competitive price</1>, while still delivering high quality work with a quick turnaround.
I build for an honest and friendly web,: I build for an honest and friendly web, so some lines will not be crossed. That is why I will not…
Ignore mobile devices or cut corners whe: Ignore mobile devices or cut corners when it comes to accessibility.
Get involved in projects relating to gam: Get involved in projects relating to gambling, crypto, NFT’s or Web3.
Design or apply deceptive techniques or: Design or apply deceptive techniques or “dark patterns” to sell your product or subscribe visitors to your services.
Advise the use of privacy-invasive analy: Advise the use of privacy-invasive analytics or tracking pixels.
Common questions: Some other things you might want to know
Will I get any support afterwards?: Will I get any support afterwards?
Making sure your website of web applicat: Making sure your website of web application continues to function smoothly is crucial. The duration and intensity of continued support for your project will be tailored to your preference. For websites, there’s <2>an obligatory monthly fee</2>.
Project management and documentation wil: Project management and documentation will be shared with you on a dedicated Notion space. Design will either be done in Figma or Affinity Designer. For development, I will typically write Typescript code in a combination of React with either Gatsby, Next.js or Remix. Tailwind is my go-to styling library.
Can you help me with a no-code project?: Can you help me with a no-code project?
I take pride in my craft and do not crea: I take pride in my craft and do not create websites in a no-code environment (such as Webflow, for example). Everything is made to fit, with the utmost attention to factors like UX, responsiveness and load speed. To ensure a high quality end result, I will not be cutting any corners.
Are you available for long-term consulta: Are you available for long-term consultancy?
Yes, of course. Bigger projects that spa: Yes, of course. Bigger projects that span a longer period—months or even years—come with a set of challenges that I am no stranger to. I have several years of experience working with start-ups and on mature digital projects in an agile environment. My rates are mentioned on <2>the pricing page</2>.
